text: Joanna Crussie DeVarona, better known as Joanna Kerns (born February 12, 1953) in San Francisco, California) is an American actress. She is best known for playing Maggie Seaver in the sitcom Growing Pains. She has had guest roles on other television series. == Other websites == * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from San Francisco Category:American television actors
title: Joanna Kerns
